topics.body:
+Does anyone here use reddit?+

I keep getting this: *"You've submitted too many links recently. Please try again in a hour"* message every damn time I try to submit some of my pony videos to various MLP subreddits. And it's kind of annoying, since I've only submitted two videos in the past month.

Which is stupid, because I wanna advertise my pony stuff on places that isn't here, the MLP Wiki, or (with no luck so far) Equestria Daily.

_Can somebody explain this? Am I doing something wrong?_
